data:text/html,<style>html,body{height:100%;margin:0}</style><link rel="icon"href="data:image/x-icon;base64,"type="image/x-icon"><title id="realTitle"></title><textarea id="txtTitle"style="min-width:100%;min-height:5%;height:5%;margin:0;padding:0;border:none;font-size:2em;background-color:2f7dff;color:ffffff;text-align:center;resize:none;display:inline;font-weight:bold;font-family:monospace"oninput="updateURL()"></textarea><textarea id="txtBody"style="resize:none;font-size:2em;min-width:100%;color:2f7dff;min-height:90%;border:none;outline:none;padding:20px;margin:0;font-family:monospace"onfocus="updateText();this.selectionStart=this.selectionEnd=this.value.length;"placeholder="Unfurl your notes here..."onload="updateText()"oninput="updateURL()"></textarea><button onClick="saveTextArea()"id="saveButton"style="min-width:100%;min-height:5%;margin:0;padding:0;border:none;background-color:2f7dff;color:ffffff;font-size:1em;font-family:monospace;font-weight:bold"autofocus>Save</button><script>function saveTextArea(){var uri="data:application/octet-stream,"+encodeURIComponent(txtBody.value);var link=document.createElement("a");link.href=uri;link.download=txtTitle.value+".txt";document.body.appendChild(link);link.click();document.body.removeChild(link);history.pushState({old:decodeURIComponent(getHash()),updated:txtBody.value},"updated name",fullHash(txtTitle.value,txtBody.value));};function getHash(){return(document.URL.split("%23").length>1)?document.URL.split("%23").pop():"";};function updateURL(){history.replaceState({old:decodeURIComponent(getHash()),updated:txtBody.value},"updated name",fullHash(txtTitle.value,txtBody.value))};function updateText(){hashParts=splitHash(getHash());txtTitle.value=hashParts[0];realTitle.innerHTML=hashParts[0]+" - Furlong Text - Go Further";txtBody.value=hashParts[1]};function fullHash(title,body){return"%23"+encodeURIComponent(title+"\n"+body)};function splitHash(hash){parts=decodeURIComponent(hash).split("\n");title=parts[0].length>0?parts[0]:"Furlong Text Document";body=parts.slice(1).join("\n");return[title, body]};addEventListener("popstate",function(event){updateText()});addEventListener("locationchange",updateText);addEventListener("pushState",updateText);setTimeout(function(){updateText();updateURL()},10)</script>#%0A
